channel.title: Python on RaphGL
channel.description: Recent content in Python on RaphGL

item.title: Syngit
item.description: Find it on GitHub Syngit is a CLI and init service that let’s you synchronize repositories across different clients (Github, Codeberg, Gitlab, etc) with a very simple interface and configuration file.

item.title: Poetry is a saner package manager for Python
item.description: Like many, I enjoy Python and the versatility and speed of development it provides. But, to me Python tooling is a big deal breaker.
